cleaning_workflow.expression:
if(cells['Date'].value instanceof Date) cells['Date'].value.toISOString().slice(0,10) else 
  if(value.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/)) value else 
  if(value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}$/)) (new Date(value)).toISOString().slice(0,10) else 
  if(value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/)) (new Date(value.split('-').reverse().join('-'))).toISOString().slice(0,10) else 
  if(value.match(/^\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/)) (new Date(value)).toISOString().slice(0,10) else 
  if(value.match(/^[A-Za-z]+ \d{1,2} \d{4}$/)) (new Date(value)).toISOString().slice(0,10) else value

'20' + value.split(/[\/\-]/)[2] + '-' + value.split(/[\/\-]/)[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + value.split(/[\/\-]/)[1].padStart(2,'0') : (value.match(/^[A-Za-z]+ \d{1,2}, \d{4}$/) ? value.toDate('MMMM dd, yyyy').toString('yyyy-MM-dd') : '')))

cleaning_workflow.expression: if(value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/)) { var parts = value.split('-'); return parts[2] + '-' + parts[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + parts[1].padStart(2,'0'); } else if(value.match(/^\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/)) { return value.replace(/\//g, '-'); } else if(value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/)) { var parts = value.split('/'); var year = '20' + parts[2]; return year + '-' + parts[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + parts[1].padStart(2,'0'); } else if(value.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/)) { return value; } else if(value.match(/^\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}$/)) { return value.replace(/\./g, '-'); } else if(value.match(/^[A-Za-z]{3,9} \d{1,2} \d{4}$/)) { var dt = new Date(value); return dt.getFullYear() + '-' + String(dt.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0') + '-' + String(dt.getDate()).padStart(2,'0'); } else { return value; }

cleaning_workflow.expression:
value.match(/^\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/) ? value :
value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/) ? value.split('-')[2] + '-' + value.split('-')[1] + '-' + value.split('-')[0] :
value.match(/^\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}$/) ? value.replace(/\./g, '-') :
value.match(/^\d{8}$/) ? value.slice(0,4) + '-' + value.slice(4,6) + '-' + value.slice(6,8) :
value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}$/) ? value.split('/')[2] + '-' + value.split('/')[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + value.split('/')[1].padStart(2,'0') :
value.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/) ? value : null

cleaning_workflow.expression:
value.match(/\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}/) ? value : 
  value.match(/\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}/) ? value.split('-')[2] + '-' + value.split('-')[1] + '-' + value.split('-')[0] :
  value.match(/\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}/) ? value.split('/')[2] + '-' + value.split('/')[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + value.split('/')[1].padStart(2,'0') :
  value.match(/\d{8}/) ? value.slice(0,4) + '-' + value.slice(4,6) + '-' + value.slice(6,8) :
  value.match(/\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}/) ? value.replace(/\//g,'-') :
  value.match(/\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}/) ? value.replace(/\./g,'-') : value

Standardize State abbreviation to uppercase

Fill missing Vehicle_Type with 'Sedan'
Fill missing Loan_Amount with average (calculate approx. 18900) and convert to number

Parse Rental_Date in various formats to ISO yyyy-MM-dd
cleaning_workflow.expression:
value.match(/^\d{4}[-/]\d{2}[-/]\d{2}$/) ? value :
  value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}$/) ? 
    Date.parse(value, 'MM/dd/yyyy').toString('yyyy-MM-dd') :
  value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/) ?
    Date.parse(value, 'dd-MM-yyyy').toString('yyyy-MM-dd') :
  value.match(/^\d{2}\.\d{2}\.\d{4}$/) ?
    Date.parse(value, 'dd.MM.yyyy').toString('yyyy-MM-dd') :
  value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/) ?
    Date.parse(value, 'MM-dd-yy').toString('yyyy-MM-dd') :
  value.trim()
